org.apache.ignite.internal.jdbc2

Class JdbcBlob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.jdbc2.JdbcBlob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Blob

    public class JdbcBlob
extends Object
implements Blob
    Simple BLOB implementation. Actually there is no such entity as BLOB in Ignite. So using arrays is preferable way to work with binary objects. This implementation can be useful for reading binary fields of objects through JDBC.
